Class TeacherManagementController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.TeacherManagementController
public class TeacherManagementController extends Object
Controller class for managing the teacher functionality. This class handles the UI and operations for managing teachers. It includes methods for navigating to different sections and performing various tasks.
